document_data.name: Spruce Beer
document_data.mainbody: '''Spruce beer''' was an [[alcohol]]ic beverage created by the [[human]]s of the [[High Moor]], using the [[spruce]] [[tree]]s of the [[Misty Forest]].
document_data.Description: Spruce beer was a foul alcoholic drink made with twigs and braces of the spruce tree, [[sugar]] extracted from [[sugar beet]]s, and [[molasses]]. The High Moor [[barbarian]]s consumed the resulting drink during ceremonies and celebrations.
document_data.History: [[Orlenstar Thirlthorn]], a [[druid]] of [[Silvanus]] and caretaker of the [[God's Grove]] shrine in [[Wheloon]], [[Cormyr]], brewed his own spruce beer by the {{YearlinkName|1358}}. This was one of a number of factors that made the grove a popular spot for locals.
